thread.title: April
thread.title_full: Gift Card Granny reviewed by April

author: April
title: April
text: I love Gift Card Granny and use it all the time! I tell my friends & family about it as well. Why should anyone pay full price for a gift card when they can buy it at a discount? It's so easy to use and has saved me so much money! And now that they are offering points that can be redeemed for more gift cards, it's even better. I also have the app on my phone.
